lead_paragraph: U.S. and foreign airlines will no longer be responsible for matching names of passengers against the terror watch list.
snippet: U.S. and foreign airlines will no longer be responsible for matching names of passengers against the terror watch list.

headline.main: U.S. Takes Over Airline Passenger Checks
headline.seo: Terror Watch Checks of Air Passengers Now in U.S. Hands
headline.print_headline: U.S. Takes Over Airline Passenger Checks
